description: The Plone Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to supporting and advancing the open-source content management system, Plone.

text.data: Established in 2004, the foundation plays a crucial role in the Plone community by providing governance, legal, and financial support for the development and promotion of the Plone platform. With a global reach, the Plone Foundation fosters collaboration among a diverse group of developers, users, and organizations who contribute to the growth and sustainability of Plone. Its mission is to protect and promote Plone as a powerful and secure open-source CMS solution for organizations and communities worldwide.

title: Plone Foundation
